## Registration Dates

<hr>

- **Registration Opens:** 15th October 2024
- **Registration Deadline (for speakers):** 12th January 2025
- **Registration Deadline:** 1st February 2025

<br>

## Registration Process

<hr>

Registration for the conference and short course is now open! **To register, please fill out the [Registration Form](https://www.conftool.org/admtp2025/) before the deadline.** 
<!-- Registration is free of charge, but a deposit of 50 € will be required before the conference. -->

**Conference Registration fees:** €50

**Bayesian Adaptive Trials short course registration fees** (further details about the course can be found [here](https://admtp.github.io/ADMTP2025/course.html))
<ul>
  <li>Industry/Commercial Registration: €600.00</li>
  <li>Academic/Public sector/Charity Registration: €450.00</li>
  <li>Postgraduate Student Registration: €250.00</li>
</ul>

<br>

## Payment Instructions

<hr>

After completing the registration form, you will receive an email with payment instructions. Please ensure that the payment is made by the specified deadline to secure your registration.

<br>

## Contact Information

<hr>

If you have any questions or need further assistance regarding registration, please contact us at [david.robertson@mrc-bsu.cam.ac.uk](mailto:david.robertson@mrc-bsu.cam.ac.uk).

We look forward to welcoming you to the conference!
